channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech

item.title: iPhone 17, the ‘thinnest iPhone ever,’ and everything else we’re expecting out of Apple’s hardware event
item.description: From a new slim iPhone Air model to redesigned AirPods, here's what to expect from this year's Apple event.

item.title: Microsoft AI chief says it’s ‘dangerous’ to study AI consciousness
item.description: As AI chatbots surge in popularity, Mustafa Suleyman argues that it's dangerous to consider how these systems could be conscious.

item.title: Take $15 Off 'Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4' Remasters Right Now

item.title: Kanye West Said Memecoins ‘Prey On Fans.’ Then He Apparently Launched One
item.description: A new cryptocurrency promoted by Kanye West’s X account soared in value—then crashed, inflicting losses on the majority of investors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s X may finally settle $500M severance lawsuit
